def_en: If an object is personalized, it is marked with the name or initials of its owner.
If you personalize something, you do or design it specially according to the needs of an individual or to your own needs.

def_cn: 使（论点、讨论、思想、事情）针对个人；使个人化
def_en: If you personalize an argument, discussion, idea, or issue, you consider it from the point of view of individual people and their characters or relationships, rather than considering the facts in a general or abstract way.
